tool.name: display
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraytmpl False output_data_Result $output_data_Result name display tmpl $tmpl prefer $prefer response $response outputType_Result $OutputSection_Result.outputType_Result transmissionMode_Result $OutputSection_Result.transmissionMode_Result

param.name: tmpl
param.label: Template name
param.help: The name of the template to fill. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_Result
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_Result
param.label: The welcome message
param.help: The HTML content out of the template.
